name: Red Handed (Games@MQ)
description:
Red Handed is a point-and-click adventure game where you play as a rouge detective investigating a mysterious mansion to solve a missing persons case. Discover many items to use in your investigation and interrogate suspects to catch the culprit, Red Handed.

If you'd like to play the game in-browser, visit the creator's game page here: https://bazzagibbs.itch.io/red-handed

Note: created over one semester at Macquarie University in Games Project B (COMP3151).
